name: equeucl
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))

stmt.origin: com12(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))

comment: Equality is a left-Euclidean binary relation. (Right-Euclideanness is stated in ~ ax-7 .) Curried (exported) form of ~ equtr2 . (Contributed by BJ, 11-Apr-2021.)
